data.text:
1982 & 1983

Hans Hulsbosch pioneers the concept of combining research, strategy, brand/re-brand creation and advertising in Australia and offers creative services to advertising and design companies

Art Directors Club Magazine Ad of the Year – ‘Who’s That Drinking Campari?’

Facts Awards – gold award for Hoover TV ads

1984

Qantas – Hulsbosch’s First Client

Sitmar Cruises – Hulsbosch’s Second Client

Fairstar The Funship – Naming

Facts Awards – TV Ad of the Year ‘Tia Maria Gold & Brown’

1985

Kentucky Fried Chicken: ‘Chinese Pack’ – Packaging Design

Qantas – numerous projects, including employee engagement and loyalty programs

Sitmar Cruises – Advertising Campaign

1986

GIO – Brand Identity

Qantas – Global Signage System

Sitmar Cruises – Continued to rollout advertising campaigns

Sitmar Cruises – Adnews ‘Best Travel Ad of the Year’

1987

Airshows Downunder – Brand Identity

The Kidney Foundation – Brand Identity

The Kidney Foundation – UK Mobius Award for Brand

Streets ‘Siesta’ Ice Cream – Packaging Design

1988

The ‘Holy See’ Pavilion: 1988 World Expo in Brisbane, Australia – Art Direction

P&O & Princess Cruises – Hulsbosch appointed for Branding and Advertising

Tooheys Blue – Packaging Design

1989

The International Works On Paper – Brand Identity

Featherdale Wildlife Park – Brand Identity

Qantas Bicentennial Airshow Pavilion, Richmond, NSW – Brand Identity

1990

‘The Rocks’ : Sydney’s iconic tourist destination – Brand Identity

P&O Fairstar – Brand Identity and Positioning

Qantas : 70 Year Celebration – Commemorative Poster Designs

P&O Faitstar campaign ‘Clear The Decks’ has all time record bookings

1991

P&O – Brochure Design

Australian Air Force – Brand Identity and Re-Positioning

Woolcott Research – Brand Identity

AC Nielsen – Brand Identity

1992

Karma Gourmet Cuisine – Packaging Design

Environmental Protection Authority: ‘Do The Right Thing’ – Logo

Glade – Packaging Design

Allowrie Foods – Packaging Design

1993

Hans Hulsbosch appointed Director of Graphic Design at the Design Institute of Australia

The Australian, The Bulletin and Sydney Morning Herald – Brand Feature Articles

Princess Cruises – National Brand Campaign

1994

Foxtel – Brand Identity

Thins, Doritos and Tostitos – Packaging Design

Kleenex and Huggies – Packaging Design

Glade – Packaging Redesign

1995

Thins Chips – UK Mobius Award for Packaging Design

Streets Ice Cream – The New York Art Directors Club Award

Toilet Duck – Brand Identity and Packaging Design

P&O ‘Bali Sea Dancer’ Cruise Ship – Brand Identity and Naming

1996

Colonial Group and the State Bank of NSW – Branding

Kleenex – London Advertising Awards: GOLD

Mr Muscle – Brand Identity and Packaging Design

Saltram Wine – Rebrand and Packaging Range Design

1997

Hans Hulsbosch wins Telstra’s Federal Government ‘Entrepreneur of the Year’ Award

Gatorade – Packaging Design

Hans Hulsbosch appointed ‘Patron of the College’ at Sydney Institute of Technology Design Centre

1998

MLC Plum Superannuation – Brand Identity / Naming

AMP – Rebrand

Disprin – Packaging Design (International)

P&O – ‘Tourism Brochure of the Year’ Award

1999

Hulsbosch – AdNews ‘Specialist Agency of the Year’ Award

AMP: Olympic Sponsorship – Identity

Australian Water Technologies – Brand Identity

Qantas: First, Business and Economy Class – Identity System

2000

Perpetual – Brand Identity

Brampton Island – Rebrand

‘Mosman is…’ for Mosman Council – Brand Identity

P&O’s Pacific Sky – Brand Identity and Campaign

2001

Australian Airlines – Brand Identity

Telecom NZ and AAPT merger – Brand Identity

Kleenex – Mobius Award UK for Best Packaging

P&O Cruises – Global Visual System

2002

Australian Airlines – Mobius Award UK

Australian Airlines – London Advertising Award

P&O Cruises – AMI Award for Marketing Excellence in Tourism and Leisure

Suncorp-Metway purchase GIO – Brand Positioning / Migration

2003

MLC – Rebrand

The Bobby Goldsmith Foundation – Brand Identity

Sydney Convention and Exhibition Centre – Integrated Global Brand Campaign

P&O Cruises – AMI Award for Best Ad Campaign

2004

Zurich Insurance – Rebrand

Free TV – Brand Identity

Manchester Unity – Brand Positioning

P&O Cruises – ADMA Marketing Effectiveness Award

2005

Sofitel Hotel Group – Marketing Campaign

Marbig office supplies – Brand Identity

Dettol – Packaging Identity (International)

P&O ‘See Asia by Sea’ Campaign – achieves all-time record bookings

2006

Hulsbosch – B&T ‘Specialist Agency of the Year’ award

P&O Cruises: ‘Clear the Decks’ Campaign generates new booking record

CreditCorp Group – Brand Identity

Exit Mould – Packaging Range

2007

Conventions Australia – Global Campaign

Nylex – Packaging Identity

Robert Oatley Wines’ ‘Wild Oats’ – Packaging Identity

2008

Qantas – Cannes Lion Award

2009

Royal Caribbean Cruises: ‘Feel Special’ – Campaign Launch

Caltex ‘Star Mart’ – Brand Identity

Schwarzkopf & Henkel – Brand Positioning

2010

Hulsbosch – Adnews ‘Specialist Agency of the Year’ award

Starlight Children’s Foundation – Rebrand

Meals On Wheels – Brand Identity

Woolworths – awarded ‘Australia’s Most Valuable Brand’

2011

Woolworths – Retail Environment

2022

Celebrating 40 Years of Creating Iconic Brands

Coles Own Brand Fresh Milk – Portfolio Redesign
